extends Object
implements ImvEvaluatorManager

      • provideRecommendation

        protected de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.ImvRecommendationPair provideRecommendation(ImSessionContext context)
        Provides a recommendation by asking all units and using the simple recommendation comparator to find the recommendation with the least privilege. Especially important for inheritance.
        Parameters:
        context - the context, which holds connection specific values
        Returns:
        the recommendation pair (recommendation, result)
